original_text: Upon the termination or expiration of this Agreement, or upon the Disclosing Party's earlier request, the Receiving Party shall promptly return to the Disclosing Party or, at the Disclosing Party's option, destroy all Confidential Information and any copies, extracts, or derivatives thereof. The Receiving Party shall provide a written certification of such return or destruction signed by an authorized officer of the Receiving Party within ten (10) days of such compliance.
gold_simplification: When this agreement ends (or earlier if requested), the receiving party must immediately return or destroy all confidential information and any copies. The receiving party must provide written proof, signed by an authorized officer, that they have done this within 10 days.
key_facts: Must return or destroy all Confidential Information upon termination or request
Includes all copies, extracts, and derivatives
